title: Organic Whole Milk
description: Organic whole milk from grass-fed cows. Rich in nutrients and natural taste.

title: Artisan Cheddar Cheese
description: Aged cheddar cheese from local artisan cheesemakers. Sharp and savory flavor.

title: Greek Yogurt
